name: go
description: Go is an open source programming language that makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software

install: if($IsWindows){_cleanup C:\go\src ; _unzip $filename C:\}else{sudo rm -rf /usr/local/go/src ; sudo mkdir -p /usr/local ; sudo tar -zxf $filename -C /usr/local/ ; sudo ln -sf /usr/local/go/bin/* /usr/local/bin/}
